bibl.title: Greek Lyric Poetry. A Commentary on Selected Larger Pieces. Alcman, Stesichorus, Sappho, Alcaeus, Ibycus, Anacreon, Simonides, Bacchylides, Pindar, Sophocles, Euripides.
bibl.note: Texts. - Commentary. - Bibliography. Index of Passages Discussed. Greek Index. General Index. - The author has collated from the original fifteen of the twenty-two papyri used for the text.
bibl.seg: HUTCHINSON G.O., Greek Lyric Poetry. A Commentary on Selected Larger Pieces. Alcman, Stesichorus, Sappho, Alcaeus, Ibycus, Anacreon, Simonides, Bacchylides, Pindar, Sophocles, Euripides.
Oxford, University Press, 2001, 8°, xviii-532 pp. ISBN 0-19-924017-5. £65.
